name: Equilibrium of Existence
description:
Equilibrium of Existence is a audio-based action game with pixel art graphics. The player must listen to the music and the sound effects to avoid obstacles and  balance.   Developed for PC platform with Unity game engine.

We started this project at a 48-hour game jam event "Homemade Jam" organized by ITU Game Design and Development Club on December 18-20, 2020. We couldn't finish the game in time unfortunately. #homemade-jam

--- Controls ---

You can access the controls of the game and how it is played from the "How To Play" section in the menu.

Use mouse X axis to balance yourself according to panning of the soundtrack. We definitely recommend using headphones for this.

Use mouse left button to jump above obstacles.
